message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which is worth $80 to you. I am proposing to sell it to you for $95, reflecting its high quality and value. Please let me know if this offer suits your budget.

Alice, thanks for the offer. I appreciate you recognizing the value of the product to me. However, $95 is a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $80 for it, which is the maximum I can afford. Let me know if you're open to that.
